name: Medieval Mystery Match
summary: Enjoy this medieval themed fantasy match 3 game. Play in a variety of environments and travel this fantasy world as you match your way through 100 levels. Earn gold along the way that can earn you bonuses and extra special symbols to help you progress through the harder levels. Watch for hints and learn tricks to master each level with the highest score possible. Replay levels to earn new high scores. With more than 20 hours of gameplay content including a timed and relaxed mode, you'll be certain to enjoy this game for a long time.
